cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on April 21, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 826, Divided Families Reunification Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 21 (Thursday, February 4, 2021)]
[House]
[Pages H387-H388]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. MENG:
H.R. 826.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[[Page H388]]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: Divided Families Reunification Act
